column4: i didn't have my menu.lst ubgradet during my gutsy to hardy upgrade but i should have, how can i
i didn't have my menu.lst ubgradet during my gutsy to hardy upgrade but i should have, what can i do now?
does this command still want to upgrade packages?   sudo aptitude dist-upgrade
i guess you will have to complete the upgrade then, it seems the upgrade failed.
but during the upgrade i was asked if i want the menu.lst upgraded and i said "no"
but now i want to say yes but i think it is too late
hmm, yea.  maybe this does it.  sudo dpkg-reconfigure -plow grub; sudo update-grub
do that once aptitude has finished upgrading tho
hmm it says that it has updated menu.lst but it has not
there is still the gutsy kernel
gdm stop doesn't work for me
it ought to, killing gdm directly doesn't give a chance for pid files to be cleaned up
hmm - ah you'Re right! it didn'T work because i was executing gdm while being in /etc/init.d insted of executing ./gdm
